import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { GeneralContext } from '../context/GeneralContext'; const Register = ({ setIsLogin }) => { const { setUsername, setEmail, setPassword, setUsertype, usertype, setRestaurantAddress, setRestaurantImage, register } = useContext(GeneralContext); const handleRegister = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await register(); } return (

setUsername(e.target.value)} />
setEmail(e.target.value)} />

setRestaurantAddress(e.target.value)} />
setRestaurantImage(e.target.value)} />
}

); } export default Register;
